creator: gerhardus.geldenhuis@gmail.com
text:
Currently the mod_jk config files are only checked for unknown attribute names
and not unknown attribute values.

Let's keep this around as a reminder, eventually for JK3:

- checking values, which must come from a list of constants
- checking if numeric values are actually numeric
- validating proper value ranges (negative numbers etc.)
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
mturk@apache.org
text:
Like Rainer said. This is JK3 material

Some things won't be checkable anyhow until actually used,
like valid host names, ports, etc.
Some can with predefined set of valid attributes.
